body_text:
Which anime has the most number of filler episodes and the longest filler arc? Many animes have filler episodes and arcs. So this question has two parts:

Which anime has the most number of filler episodes? 
What is the length of the longest filler arc?

How long is the longest running anime series? I know that the Pokemon anime has over 800 episodes, and One Piece has 600+ episodes, but I've heard that they are not in the top 10 of anime with the most number of episodes.
So what anime is longest?
